Module org.example
Package org.example.controllers

Class AppointmentOperation

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wgu.cristianreyes.controllers.AppointmentOperation
  • public class AppointmentOperation
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class for the Appointment Operation window used in adding and updating appointments.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  AppointmentOperation.Operations
      An inner enum type used to specify the type of appointment operation being performed: adding or updating an appointment.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      private void addAppointment()
      Action for the saveButton when the operation field == Operations.ADD, verifies data in the form fields and saves a new appointment to the database if valid.
      private void applyResources()
      Applies language resources from the ResourceBundle in the resources field to the appropriate labels and controls.
      private boolean appointmentsOverlap​(Appointment appointment1, Appointment appointment2)
      Checks if two appointment times overlap.
      void cancelOperation()
      On action for the cancel button, confirms the cancel and closes the appointment operation window.
      private void clearNotifications()
      clears notifications from the notifications area.
      private boolean confirmCancel()
      A confirmation alert confirms that the user wants to cancel the appointment operation.
      private void displayBlankFieldError()
      Displays an error alert informing that a field in the form is empty.
      private void displayEndTimeBeforeStartTimeError()
      Displays an error informing that the entered appointment end time is prior to the start time.
      private void displayInvalidHourError()  
      private void displayInvalidMinuteError()  
      private void displayOutsideOfWorkHoursError()
      Displays an error informing the user that the times entered in the form for the new or existing appointment are outside of business hours.
      private void displayOverlapingAppointmentError​(Appointment customerAppointment)
      Displays an error alert in the case that the appointment times in the form overlap an already existing appointment.
      private void displayStartAfterEndDateError()
      Displays an error informing that the entered appointment end date is prior to the start date.
      private Appointment getAppointment()
      Initializes and returns an Appointment instance with the data entered in the window's fields.
      private java.time.LocalTime getEndTime()  
      private java.time.LocalTime getStartTime()  
      private void highlightField​(javafx.scene.Node field)
      Sets a node's style to indicate an error.
      void initialize()
      Controller initialization method.
      private void invalidCustomerIdAlert()
      Displays an error informing that the customer ID entered in the form does not correspond to an existing customer.
      private void invalidUserIdAlert()
      Displays an error informing that the user ID entered in the form does not correspond to an existing user.
      private void modifyAppointment()
      Verifies all fields are valid, updates the selected appointment, and closes the appointment operation window..
      private boolean noEmptyFields()
      Checks that all fields in the form are filled out, calling error display methods for any empty fields and returning whether or not all fields are filled out.
      void setAppointment​(java.lang.Integer appointmentId)
      Receives the appointment ID of the appointment to be modified in this window.
      void setAppointmentsDb​(AppointmentDaoImpl appointmentsDb)
      Sets the value of appointmentsDb field which is used to interact with the database storing appointment data.
      private void setFieldLength​(javafx.scene.control.TextField field, int maxLength)
      Sets the max length of text entered in the given TextField to the given maxLength.
      private void setNumericOnly​(javafx.scene.control.TextField... fields)
      For each passed in TextField, ensures that only numeric characters may be entered into the TextField.
      void setOperation​(AppointmentOperation.Operations op)
      Sets the operation field to an Operations enum.
      private boolean validDates()
      Validates the start and end dates entered in the appointment operation form.
      private boolean validFields()
      Employs various field verification methods.
      private boolean validIds()
      Validates the customer and user ids entered in the form.
      private boolean validTimes()
      Validates the start and end times for the appointment entered in the form fields.

      Ensures that an appointment date time falls within work hours.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        Controller initialization method.

      • setAppointmentsDb

        public void setAppointmentsDb​(AppointmentDaoImpl appointmentsDb)
        Sets the value of appointmentsDb field which is used to interact with the database storing appointment data.
        Parameters:
        appointmentsDb - an AppointmentDaoImpl instance.

      • setFieldLength

        private void setFieldLength​(javafx.scene.control.TextField field,
                            int maxLength)
        Sets the max length of text entered in the given TextField to the given maxLength.
        Parameters:
        field - the TextField we are applying a max length constraint to.
        maxLength - the maximum number of characters that can be entered in field.

      • setNumericOnly

        private void setNumericOnly​(javafx.scene.control.TextField... fields)
        For each passed in TextField, ensures that only numeric characters may be entered into the TextField.
        Parameters:
        fields - varargs list of TextFields

      • setOperation

        public void setOperation​(AppointmentOperation.Operations op)
        Sets the operation field to an Operations enum. This field dictates the behavior of various methods in the controller.
        Parameters:
        op - Operations enum type specifying the type of appointment operation being performed: adding or modifying. Lambdas are used within this method allowing single line statements for setting a control's action. This makes the code within more readable.

      • applyResources

        private void applyResources()
        Applies language resources from the ResourceBundle in the resources field to the appropriate labels and controls.

      • modifyAppointment

        private void modifyAppointment()
        Verifies all fields are valid, updates the selected appointment, and closes the appointment operation window..

      • setAppointment

        public void setAppointment​(java.lang.Integer appointmentId)
        Receives the appointment ID of the appointment to be modified in this window. Populates all form fields with the appointment's current data. A lambda within replaces a concrete implementation of the Predicate interface and allows for more concise code when filtering a stream.
        Parameters:
        appointmentId - the Appointment ID of an appointment to be modified.

      • cancelOperation

        public void cancelOperation()
        On action for the cancel button, confirms the cancel and closes the appointment operation window.

      • confirmCancel

        private boolean confirmCancel()
        A confirmation alert confirms that the user wants to cancel the appointment operation.
        Returns:
        true if user selects OK on the confirmation alert, returns false if user selects Cancel.

      • getAppointment

        private Appointment getAppointment()
        Initializes and returns an Appointment instance with the data entered in the window's fields.
        Returns:
        Appointment instance containing the data entered in the appointment operation form.

      • getStartTime

        private java.time.LocalTime getStartTime()

      • getEndTime

        private java.time.LocalTime getEndTime()

      • addAppointment

        private void addAppointment()
        Action for the saveButton when the operation field == Operations.ADD, verifies data in the form fields and saves a new appointment to the database if valid. Closes the appointment operation window when complete.

      • validFields

        private boolean validFields()
        Employs various field verification methods.
        Returns:
        true if all fields are valid, false if any fields fail verification.

      • validTimes

        private boolean validTimes()
        Validates the start and end times for the appointment entered in the form fields. Appointment times must be within work hours and may not overlap another appointment for the same customer. A lambda within replaces a concrete implementation of the Predicate interface and allows for more concise code when filtering a stream.
        Returns:
        true if appointment times are valid false if otherwise.

      • displayInvalidMinuteError

        private void displayInvalidMinuteError()

      • displayInvalidHourError

        private void displayInvalidHourError()

      • displayOverlapingAppointmentError

        private void displayOverlapingAppointmentError​(Appointment customerAppointment)
        Displays an error alert in the case that the appointment times in the form overlap an already existing appointment.
        Parameters:
        customerAppointment - the existing appointment that overlaps the appointment being added or updated in the form.

      • appointmentsOverlap

        private boolean appointmentsOverlap​(Appointment appointment1,
                                    Appointment appointment2)
        Checks if two appointment times overlap.
        Parameters:
        appointment1 - an appointment
        appointment2 - another appointment
        Returns:
        true if appointments share overlapping times, false otherwise.

      • displayOutsideOfWorkHoursError

        private void displayOutsideOfWorkHoursError()
        Displays an error informing the user that the times entered in the form for the new or existing appointment are outside of business hours.

      • withinWorkHours

        private boolean withinWorkHours​(java.time.ZonedDateTime appointmentDate)
        Ensures that an appointment date time falls within work hours.
        Parameters:
        appointmentDate - the date and time of the appointment.
        Returns:
        true if date time is within work hours, false otherwise.

      • displayEndTimeBeforeStartTimeError

        private void displayEndTimeBeforeStartTimeError()
        Displays an error informing that the entered appointment end time is prior to the start time.

      • validDates

        private boolean validDates()
        Validates the start and end dates entered in the appointment operation form.
        Returns:
        true if dates are valid, false otherwise.

      • displayStartAfterEndDateError

        private void displayStartAfterEndDateError()
        Displays an error informing that the entered appointment end date is prior to the start date.

      • validIds

        private boolean validIds()
        Validates the customer and user ids entered in the form. Ids must correspond to valid users and customers. Calls error display methods if ids are invalid.
        Returns:
        true if customer and user ids are valid, false otherwise.

      • invalidCustomerIdAlert

        private void invalidCustomerIdAlert()
        Displays an error informing that the customer ID entered in the form does not correspond to an existing customer.

      • invalidUserIdAlert

        private void invalidUserIdAlert()
        Displays an error informing that the user ID entered in the form does not correspond to an existing user.

      • noEmptyFields

        private boolean noEmptyFields()
        Checks that all fields in the form are filled out, calling error display methods for any empty fields and returning whether or not all fields are filled out.
        Returns:
        true if all form fields are filled out, false if any form fields are empty.

      • displayBlankFieldError

        private void displayBlankFieldError()
        Displays an error alert informing that a field in the form is empty.

      • highlightField

        private void highlightField​(javafx.scene.Node field)
        Sets a node's style to indicate an error.
        Parameters:
        field - the Node in which there is an error.

      • clearNotifications

        private void clearNotifications()
        clears notifications from the notifications area. A lambda within replaces a concrete implementation of the Predicate interface and allows for a concise one line statement for the whole method.
